news_title: Cross-Chain Expansion: Coinbase, Chainlink Launch Base–Solana Bridge

news_title: Ethereum Price Jumps Following Fusaka Activation, $3,150 Resistance In Focus
news_subtitle: Ethereum activated its Fusaka upgrade, increasing capacity 8x as BitMine bought $150M ETH
